Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Oakland in 2014...
Injured on 4/24/2016 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Injured on 4/3/2017 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/21/2019 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Traded from Oakland to Baltimore on 2/16/2020 (Going to OAK: SS C. Sala, P T. Carter. Going to BAL: SS S. Castro, CF K. Williams Jr.)...
Had first career hit on 5/8/2020, off Jeff Niemann (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/2020, off Bill Wright (DET)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2020, hitting .242 with 39 HR, 94 RBI...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 6/8/2021...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/15/2023 with a Tight Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
